name: Zero Chance Battlegrounds
description:
Zero chance battlegrounds is waiting you. If you like the style of battle royale, step into the battlefield of this desert in middle of the sea. Wars offer multiplayer gaming experience. Test your ability to target and survive against other players! Play tactically and pay attention to the enemies when you jump from airplain. The first thing you get when you go down is to watch around. In the construcks, there are items to keep you alive. Take action before others and get the equipments.

There are many guns in the game, such as an Sniper rifle, ak47, a tactical assault rifle, a shot rifle, a hand bomb. Take one of the guns and protect yourself until the end of the game! It's not just real players that you need to watch out for. The constantly constricting electromagnetic field needs to be accounted for. If you stay outside the area, a bad end is waiting for you.

Features:
-Pixel characters and places,
-A desert in middle of the sea which you struggle to survive,
-Armors and weapons to protect you from enemies. At the same time, first aid supplies to heal your wounds,
-Vehicles to help you travel faster on the battlefield,
-Multiplayer gaming experience,
-Fun armed conflicts.

Rate us 5 star to continue to improve the game, we are working on much more big stuffs!

Enjoy!
